name: IB_MSG_IMG_FINDINGS
description: The IB_MSG_IMG_FINDINGS table contains information about imaging finding records associated with an In Basket message.

columns.name: MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the task record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: IMAGING_FINDING_ID
columns.description: The imaging finding IDs associated with an In Basket message.
